data.title: Gardner White's Local Furniture & Mattress Stores
data.meta_description: Shop one of the thirteen local furniture and mattress stores that Gardner White has in southeast Michigan! Carrying all the latest brands, styles, and sizes of furniture and mattresses to help you turn your house into a home!
data.text:
Ann Arbor

Visit your local Ann Arbor area Gardner White Furniture & Mattress store. Located on the east side of Ann Arbor in the Arborland Center at the northeast corner of the US-23 and M17, or Washtenaw Avenue. Look for us in the back right of the shopping center all the way to the end!

Book an Appointment

Auburn Hills

Our flagship location is located in Auburn Hills along with our main warehousing operation. You can also find the GW Design Studio in our Auburn Hills location.

Book an Appointment

Brighton Design Outlet

Our Brighton location is a design outlet that carries premium luxury items from the best furniture and mattress brands available! Serving the communities of Brighton, Fenton, Green Oak Twp., Hamburg, Milford, and Whitmore Lake. Located on Grand River Ave. in the Brighton Mall, you can find our store between JoAnn Fabrics and Michael’s.

Book an Appointment

Canton

Located across the street from IKEA on Ford Rd. you will find our two-story furniture and mattress store location in Canton. This store carries all the most popular furniture and mattress brands with two floors of the best shopping experience. Serving the communities of Belleville, Canton, Garden City, Livonia, Plymouth, Wayne, & Westland.

Book an Appointment

Novi - West Oaks

In the West Oaks mall in between David’s Bridal and Party City is Gardner White’s Novi store. In addition to Novi, this store serves the communities of Commerce, Farmington, Northville, Walled Lake, and West Bloomfield. Come see why we’re Michigan’s #1 furniture store!

Book an Appointment

Rochester Hills

Our Rochester Hills location is conveniently located in the Winchester Shopping Center on the corner of Rochester and Avon Roads. This location proudly serves the local communities of Oakland Twp., Rochester (Hills), Troy, Utica, & Washington Twp. See how one of our expert staff can help you find the perfect item for your home!

Book an Appointment

Saginaw

The Saginaw Gardner White location is on Tittabawassee Rd., off of I-675, next to Buffalo Wild Wings. If you’re looking for a furniture or mattress store in the Saginaw area, see why Gardner White is Michigan’s #1 favorite! We're also Michigan's #1 Tempur-Pedic retailer, plus we carry many La-Z-Boy pieces in stock!

Book an Appointment

Shelby - Hall Road

Amidst the hustle & bustle of Hall Rd., you’ll find the Shelby Twp—Gardner White location, across from Lakeside Mall. For the best home furnishing shopping experience on Hall Rd., stop by our Shelby Twp. furniture and mattress store!

Book an Appointment

Southfield

Our Southfield Furniture & Mattress store is located on 8 Mile Rd. between Evergreen and Lahser was one of the first Gardner White locations. Stop by to experience the Gardner White difference and see why we’re Michigan’s #1 favorite furniture store!

Book an Appointment

Taylor - Eureka

Our Taylor location on Eureka Rd is right in the middle of the Downriver area’s main shopping district. It’s across the street from Southland Mall (now called Southland Center), next to Men’s Wearhouse. Stop in to see the best deals on the best home furnishings and find out why Gardner White is Michigan’s #1 furniture store!

Book an Appointment

Taylor - Telegraph

Gardner White's Taylor-Telegraph furniture and mattress store is located on Telegraph Rd, across the street from Walmart. Stop by and see why we're Michigan's #1 furniture and mattress store!

Warren - 14 Mile Road

Our Warren location is located on 14 Mile Rd. right between Mound & Van Dyke Rds. As Michigan’s #1 furniture store, you can get the best deal on the furniture or mattress you need for your home!

Book an Appointment

Waterford

Located on the corner of Walton Blvd. and Dixie Highway, you’ll find our Waterford location. If you want the best shopping experience at your local furniture or mattress store, see why Gardner White is Michigan’s favorite!

Book an Appointment
